--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> The clone decended to greet the Predacon who stuck his head on the
>chopping block.
> "I am as authentic as the idiots who took the name 'Megatron' as
their >own and they were defeated.  My spark is a creation of Vector
Sigma, a >near complete copy of the original Megatron, up until the
year 2005, >when Unicron created Galvatron.  But my memory goes back
farther, >before the Quintessons made Megaton the Tyrant that tried to
destroy >the Autobots.  I am here in search of family, but if any of
you stand >in my way-"
> The four energy vulcans mounted in the helmet powered up and fired a
>burst at Perceptor's feet.
> "You will be terminated."
> He then ascended, and awaited any further response from these so-
>called decendants of the Decepticons.

"What all this noise?" Waspinator flew out the main door over
Perceptor's head but with his usal luck caught the blast Megatron
Revived had shot and got blown to peices again. 
"Why this always happen to Waspinator?"  His head asked.
